blog.name: hellodelicatebouquettidalwave
blog.title: Mixed Bouquet
blog.description: An eclectic look at manga/anime and video games! I love classic shonen series like Dragon Ball and One Piece. Some of my favorite video games series include Pokemon, Final Fantasy, Harvest Moon/Story of Seasons, and Ace Attorney. Expect news breakdowns and reviews, as well convention reports from Katsukon in Februrary and Otakon in August.

blog.name: bnha-art-and-fiction-discord
blog.title: A place for artists and writers to showcase
blog.description: Join up with us here! Our goal is to build an environment where creators can feel welcome to express themselves. We want to bring more recognition to newer and smaller creators! We welcome all artists and writers, of any skill level, please don't be shy! Plus Ultra!!!

Our character of the week was Mashirao Ojiro, everyone did such a good job this week! Make sure that you check below for links to each of our artists! blog.name: bnha-yanduwu
blog.title: ANoThEr BnHa YaNDeRe bLOg?
blog.description: Damn right baby! Requests closed so we can catch up! Specify pronouns for imagines, if you dont we will go Gender Neutral as a default!

summary: Any headcanons for yandere Sero for a really physically weak reader? Gender neutral please. Thank you for your writing btw!
question: Any headcanons for yandere Sero for a really physically weak reader? Gender neutral please. Thank you for your writing btw!
answer:
Me, a physically weak person getting this req : yeet

- Sero to me seems like a very happy go lucky person, but like everyone else, insecurities run deep.

- In a class and school surrounded by the best of the best, I think he honestly feels… weak sometimes. So when he meets you, a physically weak person who calls him your hero for helping you out, he can’t get the sound of that out of his head.

- I think from then on he starts trying to help others more? Although in a society of little but heros, few people need help that bad.

- So it’s not long before you run into him again. He’s overjoyed to help, especially since you hail him as your hero, again.

- So I think from there he actually takes a step up, offering you his phone number in case of emergency.

- You take it gladly, doing nothing but singing his praises as you do.

- He just can’t get you out of his head, I think he slowly convinces himself that you always need his help.

- He’d probably end up stalking you, after all he needs to keep you safe!

- But at the same time, he’d probably end up biting off more than he can chew trying to defeat every villain he can find to keep you safe.

- He’d never hurt you physically, I don’t think you ever could convince him to.

- I think if you actually got hurt by a villain he’d lose it.

- I mean really, really lose it. He’s not in the Baku squad for no reason.

- After that he’d be so protective that others might start to question him.

- But I’m pretty sure you’d be just as into his delusion as he is. He’s your hero and he’s only keeping you safe. Even if that means making sure you’re inside all day.

I tried my best Anon sorry it took 6 million years. Also I trapped myself on a bus writing this so that was fun.

- mod uwu
